author: prestonf
msg: Windows uses CR+LF but Unix uses only LF.  When calculating the size of a chunk, I had assumed that it would always have a CR+LF and so made adjustments for this.  Unix did not have these and so my Unit Test chunk sizes where wrong.  This fix should clear up this problem and make UT_AxisBench and UT_LargeReturningString work on Linux platforms :-)
